lines.text: Nancy, the senator has taken a liking to you.
And just what am I supposed to do about that?
That's your business, sweetie. I'm in produce.
What if I don't play?
You know Nancy, if I had to replace you, it might take me almost a week.
That's part of the fun of it, isn't it? The risk involved.
Was that uncle Jack?
*Uncle* Jack?
That's what mommy calls him.
The world's full of relatives. Ain't it, kid?
What if I told you they're dead?
That would teach them a lesson, wouldn't it?
If you'll come at me, I'm going to hit you with the heaviest thing I can find.
I've got a tire iron in the truck. Shall I go and get it?
Well, you do, and we start swinging at each other, will you tell me what we're fighting about?
Oh Jesus! You're stupid! Don't you see she just wants to see us fighting?
I know this Comacho. He's the meanest son of a bitch you'll ever meet. Carries a knife as long as your... Or maybe longer.
El pupino grande.
What's that?
That's what the pickers call you.
I'm afraid to ask what it means.
The great cucumber.
B & E.
What's that?
Breaking and entering.
You mean you just go into peoples' houses and take things?
Well, there wouldn't be much point otherwise, would there?
